internal.content: --- title: Container Activities --- ## Containers These tasks assume that you have: - Read through the containers concepts page. - Created a Katacoda Account. - Docker Desktop is running on your machine. | Task | Description | Link | Time | | --------------------------------| ------------------ |:----------- |---------| | *** Walkthroughs *** | | | | | What is a Container? | A look under the the covers at what is a Linux Container? | Understand Containers | 10 min | | What is an Image? | A look under the the covers at what is a Linux Container Image? | Container Images | 10 min | | Docker Basics | Set of walkthroughs that cover docker basics | Docker Basics | 10 min | | *** Try It Yourself *** | | | | | Docker Lab | Running a Sample Application on Docker | [Docker Lab](/activities/containers/labs/lab1) | 30 min | Once you have completed these tasks, you should have a base understanding of containers and how to use Docker.

MdxNode.rawBody: --- title: Container Activities --- ## Containers These tasks assume that you have: - Read through the containers concepts page. - Created a Katacoda Account. - Docker Desktop is running on your machine. | Task | Description | Link | Time | | --------------------------------| ------------------ |:----------- |---------| | *** Walkthroughs *** | | | | | What is a Container? | A look under the the covers at what is a Linux Container? | Understand Containers | 10 min | | What is an Image? | A look under the the covers at what is a Linux Container Image? | Container Images | 10 min | | Docker Basics | Set of walkthroughs that cover docker basics | Docker Basics | 10 min | | *** Try It Yourself *** | | | | | Docker Lab | Running a Sample Application on Docker | [Docker Lab](/activities/containers/labs/lab1) | 30 min | Once you have completed these tasks, you should have a base understanding of containers and how to use Docker.
